TXMODEM API¶

Release:1.0
Date:June 06, 2012

A Python class implementing the XMODEM and XMODEM-CRC send protocol built on top of pySerial.

Classes¶

class txmodem.TXMODEM¶

A Python class implementing the XMODEM and XMODEM-CRC send protocol built on top of pySerial.

Note

TXMODEM objects should not utilize the __init__() constructor and should instead be created via the from_configuration() and from_serial() methods.

add_callback(event_type, callback)¶

Add a callback for the specified event.

Parameters:event_type – Type of the event which should be one of the types: EVENT_INITIALIZATION, EVENT_BLOCK_SENT, or EVENT_TERMIATION
classmethod from_configuration(**configuration)¶

Class level static method for constructing the TXMODEM object from a set of configuration parameters.

Parameters:configuration – Configuration dictionary for the serial port as defined in the pySerial API.

Note

If using this construction method the internal port object will be created and closed for each call to send().

classmethod from_serial(serial)¶

Class level static method for constructing the TXMODEM object from a pySerial Serial object.

Parameters:port – A preconfigured pySerial Serial object.

Note

If using this construction method the internal port object will not be reopened and shut down for each call to send().

send(filename)¶

Execute the transmission of the file.

Parameters:

filename – Filename of the file to transfer.
Raises:
  • ConfigurationException – Will be raised in the event of an invalid file or port configuration parameter.
  • CommunicationException – Will be raised in the event of an unrecoverable serial communication error.

Constants¶

TXMODEM.EVENT_INITIALIZATION = 0¶

Event to be fired on initialization.

function()

TXMODEM.EVENT_BLOCK_SENT = 1¶

Event to be fired on a block sent.

function(block_index, number_of_blocks)

TXMODEM.EVENT_TERMIATION = 2¶

Event to be fired on termination.

function()

Exceptions¶

exception txmodem.ConfigurationException¶

TXMODEM configuration exception.

exception txmodem.CommunicationException¶

Unrecoverable TXMODEM communication exception.

Main Class¶

class txmodem.Main¶

A Python Main-style class for command line execution of the TXMODEM functionality.

Examples :
  • python txmodem.py --file [filename] --port [port]
  • python -m txmodem.txmodem --file [filename] --port [port]
